intro: Pyrrothrix rufocapitata, commonly known as the red-capped pyrrothrix, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its foliage is often covered in fine hairs, giving it a distinctive texture. Pyrrothrix rufocapitata is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and ability to attract pollinators.
